text.content: Juan loved almost everything about his grandma.
There was only one thing he did not like.
She always sewed shirts for him.
Juan knew she did it with love.
However, all the shirts were too big.
Juan lived in a small apartment in Medellín.
He had no room to keep them all.
He had to give them away.
One day, his grandma visited by surprise.
She asked to see his shirts.
